summary: An Iowa family finds adventure, love, and heartbreak, when they spend a week at the state fair.
cast: Janet Gaynor|Will Rogers|Lew Ayres|Sally Eilers|Norman Foster|Louise Dresser|Frank Craven|Victor Jory|Frank Melton|Erville Alderson|Joe Caits|Hobart Cavanaugh|Judge Dike|Harry Holman|Doro Merande|Edward Mundy|Dike of Rosedale|John Sheehan|Lucille Ward|Ruth Warren
title: La feria de la vida
